text: Coval is a surname in multiple languages. *It is the Romanian form of the surname Kowal/Koval, meaning "forger" or "blacksmith" in Slavic languages. *Portuguese surname, typically in the form of "do Coval"Nos Portugueses - Apelido: Coval *It may also be a transliteration of Kowal/Koval into other languages. Notable people with this surname include: *Kevin Coval, American poet *Nicolae Coval, Moldavian SSR politician ==References== Category:Portuguese-language_surnames Category:Romanian-language surnames Category:East Slavic-language surnames
title: Coval
